data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Yên Bái.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yên Bái, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Yên Bái, Vietnam that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, make the 16,226 believers in Yên Bái to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 733,973 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Yên Bái, Vietnam the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Tai Dam people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Yên Bái who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Yên Bái.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yên Bái, Vietnam has a population of 750,200.

We estimate Yên Bái has 16,226 people who might know Jesus, 60,175 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 673,798 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Yên Bái, Vietnam.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
